name: GIANT APE

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The ape makes two Fist attacks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 10 ft. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Boulder Toss (Recharge 6)
actions.text: The ape hurls a boulder at a point it can see within 90 feet. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature in a 5-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point. Failure: 24 (7d6) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition. Success: Half damage only.

bonus_actions.name: Leap
bonus_actions.text: The ape jumps up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.
